definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
(zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)/(fig.) a part of an integrated whole: aspect (of a project), element (of a policy), sector (of the economy), stage (of a process), etc
to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50节图形设计免费课程将教授你大量的理论知识。

sentences.english: Anything that comes after the steps goes into another section-like element.
sentences.chinese: 步骤之后的内容放到其他类似节的元素中。

sentences.english: Galanz just about a week ago and the National US-held section of microwave ovens .
sentences.chinese: 格兰仕大约一周前刚刚与国美合作举行微波炉节。

sentences.english: Usually, this comparison is performed on a byte-by-byte basis.
sentences.chinese: 通常，这种比较是逐字节进行的。

sentences.english: Shangsi Festival on March 3rd lunar calendar is a traditional Chinese folk festival.
sentences.chinese: 农历三月三上巳节是中国传统的民间节日。

sentences.english: Turn to Isaiah 26:3 and believe it today.
sentences.chinese: 翻阅以赛亚书二十六章3节，并立志信靠它。

sentences.english: Finland is also home to the world's longest-running rock festival, Ruisrock.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰还是世界上持续时间最长的摇滚节的发源地。

sentences.english: Young Balinese girls compete during an international yoga festival in Denpasar.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘岛的年轻女孩们正在登帕萨举行国际瑜伽节比赛。

sentences.english: I admire the Mexican rite called Day of the Dead.
sentences.chinese: 我欣羡墨西哥的一个叫做亡灵节的仪式。
在提摩太后书1章7节那里，保罗这样称呼它。

sentences.english: Today is the Dragon-Head-Raising Festival in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中国北方的龙抬头节。

sentences.english: The [default] stanzas contains the password rules that are applied to the whole realm.
sentences.chinese: 节包含应用于整个领域的密码规则。

sentences.english: This paper presents a model of session-based resource allocation and management.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种基于节的资源分配和管理模型。

sentences.english: Reinforcing bar shall comply with the requirement of the drawing and the regulations of Section 403.
sentences.chinese: 钢筋应符合图纸要求和本规范第403节的规定。

sentences.english: Wish you a Marry Christmas and Happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢，也祝妳圣誔节快乐，新年蒙褔。

sentences.english: Beyond Qingshuihe, the road turns into a mud fest.
sentences.chinese: 过了清水河之后，道路再一次成了乱泥节。

definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
